name: Nimble (OkayDinos, ProLuma, pdox, luke_horner, cyps, kittycornsiri, RowJam, emira_half_blood)
name_original: Nimble (OkayDinos, ProLuma, pdox, luke_horner, cyps, kittycornsiri, RowJam, emira_half_blood)
description:
The Adventure of Mags the Herring Lass!

Collect Ingredients and Kist Items!

Travel around historic Cellardyke collecting Kist Items and Ingredients in order to cook Cullen Skink

 

 

Meet the Delightful Residents of Cellardyke!

and Start Mags's Adventure in becoming a 

'Full Fledged Herring Lass!'

 

Features:

• Dialogue

• Trading

• Minigame

• Birds!

 

Created in Collaboration with Abertay University, Abertay Game Lab and The Scottish Fisheries Museum:
